channel.title: The Holy Rosary with Mother Angelica

channel.title: Daily Mass

channel.title: The Quest
channel.desc: Documentary series explores Christian life as a narrative of joyful courage amid the world's gathering darkness, using Scripture, history, and saints' lives.

channel.title: G.K. Chesterton
channel.desc: Dale Ahlquist continues his study of the wit and wisdom of the great writer with a look at his take on common sense. S4 Ep13.

channel.desc: Father John teaches his friends about the parable of the Workers in the Vineyard.

channel.title: Children's Rosary

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: The Promise

channel.title: Women of Grace

channel.title: I Forgive with Immaculee Ilibagiza
channel.desc: Rwandan genocide survivor, Immacul?e Ilibagiza, presents stories of men and women who through their Faith, have chosen to forgive.
